title: I know the pain of having your virginity discussed by your mum
text:
Flora Gill lost her virginity 10 years ago to a man she met on her gap year. After he ghosted her, she never thought she’d hear from him again. But the journalist, who writes for the likes of Tatler and GQ, was wrong. Because, all these years later, she has received a message from him on Instagram that reads: ‘You write for GQ! That’s amazing. You might be the most accomplished person I’ve ever slept with!’ (Sent at 3.39am, eagle-eyed observers have noted).

Naturally, 28-year-old Gill - the daughter of former Home Secretary Amber Rudd and late writer A. A. Gill - took to Twitter to ask for help crafting her comeback.

‘The guy that ghosted me 10 years ago on my gap year, after I lost my virginity...
description: Flora Gill lost her virginity 10 years ago to a man she met on her gap year.
